nodes.bodyText:
I don't think this is necessary. When options are used to set the split size in the Spark reader, it uses TableProperties.SPLIT_SIZE to pass it here. That should work for metadata tables as well, right?
The situation that we need to handle in this PR is setting the default, like you had before. We just want to use a metadata split size so you can set it and not have the same split size used (by default) for both metadata and data scans.
Can we move this up by the other split size property? Also, the other name is read.split.target-size so let's use the same prefix. How about changing this to read.split.metadata-target-size?
